Text:
A big thumbs up to Reagan80 and a bowed hat tip to gotomypc-com for getting Monday and Tuesday's podcasts up here.

My Dad comes home tomorrow or Friday, so all will be back to normal before the weekend.

Glad to hear the good news about your Dad!

Thanks for looking out for all of us in the meantime - it's really appreciated, especially given your circumstances!  Wow!!!

Take care and best wishes for a continued smooth recovery!
Thanks Annoyme, I'm glad your dad will be home soon. Thanks also Reagan80 and gotomypc-com.

I second Arsventure's comments: Delighted to hear your Dad's doing really well! :)

...and thanks also for looking after us so we can get our daily Rush rush!

Many thanks!
You favorites are my favorites too. But, there is only one Maha Rushie.
